entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
